subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=lāo,láo,1nb=standard in Mainland and Taiwan,2nb=standard in Taiwan,2nc=variant in Mainland
|m_note=láo - regional Mandarin for “to scoop up”, also used in {{zh-l|*撈什子}}
|c=laau4,laau1,lou4,lou1
|c_note=laau4 - common for “to scoop up; to gain by improper means”; laau1 - “northern Chinese”, also variant for “to scoop up; to gain by improper means”; lou4 - uncommon literary variant for “to scoop up; to gain by improper means”; lou1 - “to mix; to earn a living”, also rare variant for “to scoop up; to gain by improper means”
|md=lău/lò̤
|md_note=lău - “to scoop up; to gain by improper means”; lò̤ - “to take out noodles or vegetables cooked in boiling water”
|mn=xm,zz,tw:lô/qz:lô͘/hô͘
|mn_note=hô͘ - semantic reading for “to scoop up”
|w=1'lau
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=Zh-lao.ogg
|cat=v
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[dredge]] up; to [[scoop]] out of [[water]]; to [[fish]] for
#: {{zh-x|把 金魚 撈 出來|to '''scoop''' a goldfish out}}
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} to [[grab]]; to [[take up]]
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} to [[gain]] by [[improper]] [[means]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[mix]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[earn a living]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|pejorative|from {{zh-l|*撈鬆}}}} non-[[Cantonese]] person; [[out-of-towner]]; [[northern]] [[Chinese]]
